opportunities.title: 2023 Indigenous Graduate Pathway
opportunities.description: The Indigenous Graduate Pathway provides a rewarding career in the Australian Public Service for recent Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander tertiary graduates. We recruit on behalf of a large number of Australian Government agencies who are seeking a range of skillets and abilities. You apply once through our system and your application is assessed for all participating agencies – no need to complete multiple applications.

opportunities.title: ADF Cyber Gap Program
opportunities.description: The Department of Defence has partnered with the Digital Transformation Agency to provide expert career mentoring and work exposure while you complete your cyber studies — even if you’re already working. And there’s no service commitment! The Cyber Gap Program also offers 12 months of generous financial sponsorship, professional networking opportunities, and help to apply for ADF roles on completion.

opportunities.title: Datacom Internship Program
opportunities.description: Datacom have an exciting full-time, 6 month opportunity available for an Intern to join our Network Engineering Team in Canberra. You’ll be provided training to work towards your certification in Aruba. Making you a hot commodity in the market, as it is highly sort after skill. If you have a background in Technology, more specifically in Networks, have fantastic communication skills, are available from Mid-October and hold AU citizenship, send your CV as an expression of interest to Nicole.lange@datacom.com.au.
